Verses: 1 nee Isravel Prabukkalinperil Oru Pulambal Paadi,
2 sollavendiyadhu Ennavendraal: Un Thaai Eppadippattaval? Aval Oru Pensingam, Aval Singangalukkulle Paduththirundhu, Paalasingangalin Naduvile Than Kuttigalai Valarththaal.
3 than Kuttigalil Ondru Valarndhu, Paalasingamaagi, Iraithedap Pazhagi, Manusharaip Patchiththadhu.
4 purajaadhigalum Adhin Seydhiyaik Kettaargal, Adhu Avargaludaiya Padukuzhiyil Adappattadhu; Adhai Sangiligalinaal Katti, Egipthudhesaththirkuk Konduponaargal.
5 thaaichchingam Kaaththirundhu, Than Nambikkai Abaththamaaip Poyitrendru Kandu, Adhu Than Kuttigalil Verondrai Eduththu, Adhai Paalasingamaaga Vaiththadhu.
6 adhu Singangalukkulle Sanjariththu, Paalasingamaagi, Iraithedap Pazhagi, Manusharaip Patchiththadhu.
7 avargaludaiya Paazhaana Aramanaigalil Thirindhu, Avargaludaiya Pattanangalaip Paazhaakkitru; Adhinudaiya Gerchchippin Saththaththukku Dhesamum Adhilulla Yaavum Thigaiththadhu.
8 appozhudhu Sutruppuraththu Jaadhigal Adharku Virodhamaaga Ezhumbivandhu, Thangal Valaiyai Adhinmel Veesinaargal; Adhu Avargaludaiya Padukuzhiyile Adappattadhu.

9 avargal Adhai Sangiligalinaal Katti, Oru Koottukkutpaduththi, Adhai Baabilonin Raajaavinidaththukkuk Konduponaargal; Ini Adhin Saththam Isravelin Parvadhangalinmel Ketkappadaadhapadikku Adhai Aranaana Idangalil Kondupoi Adaiththaargal.
10 nee Amarikkaiyodu Irukkaiyil Un Thaai Thanneer Oramaai Naattappattadhum, Migudhiyaana Neerppaaichchalaal Kanitharugiradhum Thazhaiththirukkiradhumaana Dhraatchachchediyaayirundhaal.

11 aalugiravargalin Sengolukketra Balaththa Koppugal Adharku Irundhadhu; Adhin Valarththi Adarththiyaana Kilaigalukkulle Uyara Ongi, Than Uyarththiyinaale Than Thiralaana Kodigalodunkoodath Thondritru.
12 aanaalum Adhu Seekkiramaaip Pidungappattu, Tharaiyile Thallundadhu; Keezhkaatrinaal Adhin Kani Kaaindhupoyitru; Adhin Balaththa Koppugal Murindhu, Pattuppoyina; Akkini Avaigalaip Patchiththadhu.
13 ippozhudhu Adhu Varandadhum Thanneer Illaadhadhumaana Vanaandhara Boomiyile Nadappattirukkiradhu.

14 adhin Kodigalilulla Oru Koppilirundhu Akkini Purappattu, Adhin Kaniyaip Patchiththadhu; Aalugira Sengolukketra Balaththa Koppu Ini Adhil Illaiyendru Sol; Idhuve Pulambal, Idhuve Pulambalaayirukkum Endraan.
